This does the job for just a few hundred.. spend the other 3K on another watch.  HOW EVER, I ordered Burlwood as in the picture. Received the shipment, Outer box said Burl.... Inner Box said Burlwood.. opened inner box to find out it was Black Laquer.. Black is $10 less on the web. Called Amazon, They credited my account. Pain in the neck..just decided to keep the black looks fine.

Like other reviews have stated, this box is very nice for the money.  I considered buying an 8 watch winder from one of the so-called premium winders but two of these are less than half the price of the premium.  Side by side, they look sharp.  They are quiet as others have stated.  You can easily set each winder for number of rotations, single direction vs. bi-direction, on or off.  I have 7 inch wrists and it looks like it would easily accommodate smaller or larger sizes. The two I received were well packaged.  I used 4 D batteries each, remains to be seen how long that lasts.
We tried other ones but after a few days they were too loud.  This one is very quite and you can tell it's good quality.

This is a beautiful dress!  It's very flattering and hides the bumps and lumps. I'm very petite but with heels, I don't think it needs hemming.  The fit is great but just a tad roomy on the breast area --but that will be an easy fix a bit of tailoring.  It's well made --it feels very special considering the price!  Plus the seller has great customer service --that alone made my 4 stars into 5! You can easily chat with them online --which I did.  Very helpful! Delivery was quick --and they have an office in southern California! Packaging, I must mention --is very good.  It wasn't fancy --just the usual plastic mailing envelope but what impressed me was the fact that they  have all the information you need if you need to exchange your dress for a bigger size or a different color! They want you to be totally happy with your purchase --how refreshing! Will definitely buy from this seller again.  If you're hesitant about ordering a dress online --don't be!  Go for it!

reviewText: I was looking for something for the bride to wear when she needed to eat while in her wedding dress.  Just wanted something that would give her a little protection from drips or spills, but not look obvious or out of place.  This  was the perfect fit, and as a bonus, also has an adorable groom's apron.  I wouldn't expect these to hold up to actual cooking or to be durable enough to wash much.  They aren't a huge apron, but sufficient for an average size adult to sit down and eat but have enough coverage.  It's not really visible in the pics, but the bride's apron even has a cute fake pearl "necklace" attached.  That's a fun little touch.  It arrived quicker than i expected, even without expedited shipping.

reviewText:
I have acquired a small amount of jewelry over the last forty years, some precious and semi-precious stones, both as gifts and when we have traveled outside the country.  I have also purchased and received a tremendous of amount of costume jewelry; many are under the label of well-known designers, and then the usual fun, and trendy, the current style at the time.

However, this set of 3 by Bamoer can rival some expensive diamond rings due to the beauty, the workmanship, and the professional attention to detail, so much so that it looks real and other than using a jeweler's loop one cannot tell the difference.

The large center `diamond' is set with four prongs, exactly like my real and very expensive pieces, and the `diamond' chips that surround the three bands are placed in the exact and precise manner that the other real diamond rings are finished.

The major stone is dazzling as it catches and reflects the light and the surrounding `diamond' chips continually sparkle.

The three separate pieces of the set are strikingly attractive in any combination; they are beautiful enough to wear separately or together, but I would not wear any other rings on the same hand, the beauty of this piece would only diminish any other finger adornment.

Another important detail is that I ordered the size 6, and it is a perfect fit, not too tight and not too loose, it remains comfortable on my finger. Bamoer jewelry is sent with a rich brown velvet draw-string pouch, an elegant presentation.

This ring would be suitable for any classy and dressy engagements, I wear this ring with pride and confidence, and it looks as realistic and as stunning as some of the most exquisite diamond jewelry.

Disclosure:  I was presented with this ring, Free of charge - for my evaluation and these opinions are my own.

reviewText: I had really high hopes for this bra from reading the reviews, but it did NOT work for me!!  If you like the uniboob look, go for it.  The size I ordered was not the issue -- the FIT was the issue.  There was no separation at all.  The band fit well, the straps were comfy and the posture-back felt good (except for the scratchiness of the material).  The cups felt flat (NOT good when you have double-D assets).  Everything felt flattened and pushed to the center (even with lots of adjustment) -- YIKES!  The uppermost part of the front-closure hooks sticks out away from the body.  This created a very strange-looking "bump" in the center of the top I threw on to see how the bra looked under clothing.  Every part of the bra had an overall "scratchy" feel.  It is in the mail to be returned as I type this review.  The search continues!!
summary: TERRIBLE FIT ISSUES WITH THIS BRA!!!

But in my humble opinion , how else can it truly support really heavy breasts of it doesn't have good side construction snug body bands and well constructed bra cups?
The big breasts are not going to go up by magic

I am very happy with the bra
However the bra is not for everyone

If the above mentioned issues are deal breakers for you then I suggest to look elsewhere for a bra
I also went up a size cause I'm my experience heavily constructed bras like this one do run snug
Thanks for your time by reading this post
summary: This bra is not for everyone

reviewText: Mixed. Beautiful bra. I love not having the straps fall down. To me it is quite comfortable. In fairness I have to say I really wanted the posture back and was willing to put up with some deficiencies. The bra really doesn't come in my cup size. I am not very endowed. Still it is pretty forgiving a fits very well. The problem is the hooks. Normally there is a center wire in the hook that springs down and holds the hook in place. These hooks are defective, the detent wire doesn't latch. It took ten minutes to figure out how to get all of them hooked without the front hooks I just connected coming undone behind me. Wearing it the hooks come undone in fifteen minutes top to bottom just from turning, bending, bouncing and breathing. I guess I will try sqeezing them tighter with pliers. The shoulder straps adjust the same way and the come loose too. I have never had a bra disconnect while in public, but I may have that experience soon. Not looking forward to it. I put a hat pin across the closure to make it stay.

I spent over a year and a half there in the Air Force Security Service from Feb 1967-Sep 1968, spending a lot of time in Istanbul and traveling as much as time would allow to other areas (we were located at Karamursel Air Base on the Bay of Izmit).

reviewText: Comfy.

This is NOT the Crown Jewels!  If you are looking for heirloom quality pieces, look elsewhere.  This was my first "Statement Necklace", and  I got SO many compliments on it, I bought it in purple as well.  These pieces are a fun, easy and inexpensive way to add color and comments to your wardrobe.  They are not trying to fool anyone into believing they are "real", they are tongue in cheek chic...I am Seventy one years old, and I was raised to wear "Ladylike accessories".  These Statement necklaces would have been considered "Trashy" and in poor taste.  However, times and styles change and I choose to wear what makes me happy.  This trend toward Statement necklaces gets people talking, and I have gotten NO negative feedback---in fact, several people have wanted to know where I bought hem.  Because styles come and go so quickly, I returned to Amazon to "stock up",  and have now purchased quite a selection of these Statement pieces so I will be enjoying them for a long while.  Unlike my "real" jewelry, these are so  Inexpensive I can afford them in all my favorite colors.  I now have over eighteen of them and they are great fun.  I wear them with plain, jewel neck sweaters in matching colors and they sit nicely at the base of the ribbing.  Then, I actually splurged on several inexpensive sheath dresses with sweetheart or V necklines in solid jewel tones to show off my new pieces.  Although many of them come in sets. With matching earrings, I find that to be "too much statement",  and so I usually wear small, co ordinating stud earrings and let the necklace speak for itself.  It has been said that the only difference between us and the animals, is our ability to accessorize, and these pieces will certainly do the trick!!

This necklace is not even worth calling costume jewelry! Although the design concept is nice, the gems are punched into the frame poorly, there are pieces of plastic sticking out in back that are pointy! They would tear the clothing you wear it on! I can't believe this item passed inspection to sell.
It's a bit larger than expected, so maybe order a size smaller. It's a very unique and cool design though. My boyfriend loves it.
summary: It's a very unique and cool design though

reviewText: I would have liked to have given this bracelet five stars. One problem is the 925 marking. It is not engraved on the bracelet, but rather it is on a small tag that is attached to the bracelet. This cannot help but make one wonder if that small attached piece is the only part of this bracelet that is actually sterling. I do know that if it were manufactured in this country it would have to be clearly marked 925 on the bracelet itself. It is a pretty piece and I do like it, but it is also almost too heavy to be sterling silver. I suspect, frankly, that it is sterling plated base metal with one tiny little attached disk that is sterling. Since I paid such a pittance for it I could recommend the purchase as it is a lovely bracelet, as long as the purchaser understands that the chances of the entire bracelet actually being sterling are pretty much slim to none. Also, I have had to repair this bracelet no less than five times now. The links that hold the bracelet together are not soldered, consequently with just the smallest amount of pressure they part and the bracelet breaks away from the link. I have twice had to replace the links myself as they were lost when the bracelet popped apart. Unless you have someone to fasten this bracelet for you each time you put it on and take it off, do not purchase it as it will soon break on you. It is a shame that this pretty bracelet is so poorly made, it truly is a lovely, unique piece, and it would be a five star bracelet if not for the myriad problems associated with it. I don't think I can honestly recommend this product for purchase. You get what you pay for truly applies here. Although I love the look, it has been one problem after another and a huge pain in the nether regions. I would like to add that I had not realized this bracelet was coming from a company called FACTORY DIRECT SALES. This company has lied to me several times, and misrepresented their products on every occasion I have dealt with them. I once purchased an office chair from them through another company, not Amazon. They took the funds from my account immediately, then sent me an email stating that the chair had been shipped. Seven days later, after being hung up on by their so called customer support team members not once but twice, I finally reached a supervisor who calls himself "steve". Steve admitted to me that not only was the chair not shipped, it was on back order. Steve promised me an upgrade, and apologized profusely for the "misunderstanding." The chair arrived a couple weeks later. It was NOT an upgrade, but it was a terrible piece of workmanship. It permanently lists to the left because the screw holes were misaligned. The chair was not worth a quarter of what I paid for it. I have emailed the company several times in the six months since this happened. I received one email from them in which they begged me not to trash them until they had been given a chance to "make things right". Six months later, that is the ONLY email I have ever received from them. If you value quality for your money, do not ever bother to purchase any thing from FACTORY DIRECT SALES. They are liars, cheaters, and have no social redeeming qualities. GUARANTEED. That is the only guarantee they will ever live up to!
summary: I would like to add that I did not realize that this bracelet was manufctured and sold by a company called Factory Direct Sales.

This hat is lightweight, dries quickly, and keeps the sun off your face. The color is nice, and the mesh is comfortable. The brim seems to be PET, so it doesn't get gross or soft. The buckle is pretty cheap, and will slip if you have it on tight. The overall design is good, but it is pretty "low rise", which makes it fit a little funny. I wear a medium hat, and a medium bike helmet, and this was pretty small, but works fine.
One thing I could really do without is the little emblem on the front, which looks a little silly, and is sewn in to the fabric, and thus not easily removed without leaving a hole. Mine started rusting a bit after a few weeks of use. It's not a deal killer, but I wish they would leave that thing off, because it doesn't improve the hat in any way. You should probably still buy this hat, as it is cheaper than alternatives, and at least as good.
summary: Not perfect, but still a great value

I install industrial flooring for a living.  Often times in high temperature environments, so breathability and freedom of movement are two very crucial components when comes to men's underwear in my line of work.
I have to continually kneel, twist, squat and stand up all throughout my day.  Other brands of underwear either get damp and uncomfortable or stretch out completely, which then causes the underwear to bind up under my work clothing and that is very uncomfortable.
With the Geoot Men's Sexy Bikini G-string T-back underwear, those problems are a thing of the past!  I literally have NOTHING covering my ass cheecks, so breathability is at a premium.  The utility pouch that I store my wiener and balls in is not only cool and comfortable, but surprisingly snug and secure thanks to the patented "wbrt (Wiener & ball ribbon technology)"

reviewText: Amazing shirts. Don't hesitate.

Love this shirt. I am a medium, athletic built guy. Neither bodybuilder type nor "slim". 5'7" and about 163 lbs. 38" chest, 32" waist. I bought a medium and it fit perfectly. It's fitted enough that I don't have the annoying bag around the waist I get with most dress shirts bought in department stores. However, it is not tight. It fits well enough that the "stretch" of the fabric is not needed for me, but the fabric DOES stretch, if that's of interest to you - obviously, it will not stretch enough to make it a good fit for someone too big for it. I bought my exact size and it worked out well.

I do not yet know how well it will stand up to standard laundry care. I also bought a Studio 10 shirt on Amazon for a few dollars more. Both look and feel good, but I slightly prefer the Studio 10 shirt (enough that for the next purchase, I would probably spend the few extra dollars to get more of the Studio 10 shirts).
summary: Fits well buying my correct size

reviewText: I bought this to wear while my white gold ring is being resized. I really like it. Its shiny and looks nice. Feels pretty sturdy. The only downside in my opinion is that its rather heavy. However, Ive been told thats common with Tungsten Carbide.

Fantastic, a truly white metal ring. Tungsten is naturally a grey colored metal and the metallurgy used to make this into "White Tungsten" is perfect. My fiance loved it as a "spacer/stacker" ring that will go in front of her white gold wedding set. The idea is that if a ring is lost/slips off it will be this one which is inexpensive and not the white gold wedding band or the white gold diamond engagement ring. She got the 2mm in size 7. Looks the same as platinum and looks slightly whiter then 14K white gold which is fine and barely noticeable. Remember that gold is naturally yellow and even white gold will retain a slight yellow hue only noticeable next to a whiter metal like platinum or this very white "white tungsten".
summary: Fantastic, a truly white metal ring

reviewText: I am in the process of losing baby weight and wanted a temporary wedding band just to have something on my finger. reviewText: It's good
I Love this shirt

First of all I received this AWESOME SHIRT at a discount for my HONEST review..

Aside from these shirts coming out for Valentines Day, they are a huge hit!! 100% Cotton Preshrunk Jersey Knit tees, 50/50 blend fleece, I prefer shirts that breath and aren't extremely thick. I use these shirts for casual days; ranging from lounging around the house and hiking trails to observe land. I used to wear Fruit of the Loom (and I swear by them!) but they are sometimes on the expensive side- rightfully so. For a cheap, awesome shirt however, these work amazingly!!

They will certainly not hold up to much abuse as a thicker cotton shirt (or Carhartt). I anticipate them having a lot fewer wash cycles (lifespan) due to their thinness, but I just need something to cover over my manly parts (where I work, you can't work shirtless). Initially they are deep in color, but after the first wash they did not fade really at all.  At least I don't have to worry about my shirts as much- now that money spent on them is less of a hindrance. Cheap shirts feel liberating. And ones like this are amazing! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

Being that it wasn't American and these clothes tend to run a bit small, I took a medium. I think that was a mistake because it did not fit snug. Everywhere else fitted nicely. I sewed the sides and it was perfect. Oh, and the material is okay, not too thick, but it wasn't see through ( I wore a purple bra underneath and it did not show). Hope this helps !

reviewText: I like this crop top because the lace cut-out and behind the neck tie make it look a bit different than most of the others that I have seen and bought -- like American Apparel's stretchy crop tops.  It's just a little loose on me but otherwise fits well and easily layers under other tops and dresses.  Unlike the model shown, it comes down almost to my waist, but I have a very short torso.  It washes well (cold water, gentle cycle, hang dry) and that's a good thing because it seemed to have a repellent odor imbedded in it.

After reading people's reviews and waffling on sizes, I went with the small. I usually wear US small, but I'm kind of a chubby small person. That being said, the shirt fit a little looser than expected, but not in an unflattering way for me.

I ordered the white and pink, both of which have some flaws. The white is pretty sheer, and I'm having trouble figuring out a bra that isn't so obviously HEY I'M A BRA!! but I like it enough to keep it. The pink is a weird pink...I was hoping for baby pink but it's a strange dusty brown-pink that blends in with my skin and makes me look naked. It's the sort of color that can only look good on someone with really pale skin, or really dark skin, of which I have neither.
summary: Cute design, but choose colors wisely

These shoelaces are very strong, but my favorite feature is how well they grip to themselves.  I usually dislike round laces because they come untied or loosen up as the day drags on.  These laces remain snug for a long time.  In fact, I still have not had them loosen up on me; even when wearing them for >16 hours.

The gripping nature of the laces does make it harder to loose the boots for removal, but I would rather have this issue than a boot that loosens up while wearing it.

The color is them is yellowish-tan with yellow hashing and look good with the light-colored leather of my boots.
summary: The best round shoelaces I have ever tried.

What can I say! It's a Vera Bradley product, always first class in workmanship, material and design.

I will start by saying I don't get the Vera Bradley craze. I'm don't care for the prints or the cloth bags and I find the popularity of this brand puzzling. I am, however, crazy about houndstooth. I also have two small dogs that keep my hands busy when I'm out and about. I purchased this keychain solely based on the print and the fact that I can clip it basically anywhere- my purse, my jeans, the dog leash, etc. I also love that it doesn't scream Vera Bradley. It might be a simple thing, but this keychain is awesome. My vehicle uses a smart key and the convenience of leaving this snapped on my purse great, but it's simple enough to remove when I get home and need to unlock the front door. The coated cotton material is easy to wipe if it gets soiled. It's well made and substantial and I hope to be able to use it for many years to come. Great job Vera Bradley, but if anyone asks I'll deny I ever said that. :)
summary: OMG, did I actually buy Vera Bradley?

So far, so good. Decent size, if a bit small on days I need to pack my tablet, laptop and a sweater along with all the other basic everyday crap. If you carry a lot of books, tech or layers, this might not be the bag for you. Stitching all seems to be holding up well. This is not made for someone without junk in the truck, stuff in the stomach or extra under the arms, however. The straps are very stiff and sometimes pinch under my arms. It does rest well on my back (doesn't sit on my tailbone). It has LOTS of lovely pockets. However I wish it had a dual zipper for the top pocket because I'm super lazy and having to zip the entire bag open just to get out something quick smacks of effort my elders would chide me for not having. Zippers stick a lot when you first get it but have eased up over time. Leather at the top of each of the front pockets is problematic as it makes it difficult to zip the pockets open and shut easily. But that might be a fault of poor design/stitching. But this isn't enough to make the bag a no go. Not waterproof even a little. But some canvas  and seam spray seal would help that.

TLDR
Pros:
Nice size
Well made straps (so far)
Lots of nice pockets.
Didn't have horrible chem smell when I took it out of the packaging (it's a thing, really)
Durable (so far)
Zippers are metal and are holding up well

Cons:
Day pack with size limitations.
Zippers are stiff and take some tugging to use (but ease with use)
Not water proof
Straps are stiff and wide
Wish it had a side pocket for a water bottle or small folding umbrella

I'll update if anything goes wrong in the coming months.
A few gems fell out within a week but otherwise good quality
summary: ... few gems fell out within a week but otherwise good quality

reviewText: It's a beautiful bag, It's just too small inside. I have to return. I can't even fit my cell phone in the front zipper.
Beautiful soft leather handbag. 100% Italian made.

I bought this as a Christmas gift. I looked in the box to make sure it was the correct item/color. It seemed nice through the plastic. I wrapped it up and could not wait to see the joy on the recipients face, when they opened it. As she was opening it, I went on about how it is "handmade, striking, and top quality". Then I saw the look on her face. It was the look of "Are you serious? I hope you did not pay more then $20 for this".  She then asked me if it was a used purse, as that is how it appeared.

"Striking" = It looked the the hardware was struck with a hammer, It was scuffed/scratched up like it was used or very cheaply made. I guess in that sense you could call it striking.

"Top Quality" = The stitching on the liner was very shoddy and lose. It did come in a fabric/canvas like tote, which I thought was a nice/classy touch. That was until I noticed the ink or dye stains on it.

"Hand Made" = If this is made by hand, you would think they would notice how poorly it was made prior to sending it out. They either need to supply glasses or eyes to the people making it. Some type of a quality control needs to be put in place.

I am not sure at this point if I want to return it or give them another try and replace it. As is, it is $100 plus dollars over priced. For that reason, I am leaning towards a refund. I will update once decided.
summary: If you like to return things. This is a must have!

Most defiantly some kind of aluminum alloy- which may or may not contain titanium.

Item received is much larger than the 20ish mm advertised diameter
(over 31.5mm diameter)

Biggest issue is the ring is a flat spring coil- the split ring is too thick to properly fit standard keys- even my VW switchblade key fob does not have enough clearance to move freely.

Not pleased- $6 for a key ring not made of titanium is an absurd asking price.

Ring itself is very light weight and appears to be reasonably strong- however the alloy has poor memory and has already started stretching out and not returned to the original shape.

I attached the ring to a 3/4" MOLLE loop on my pack and will use it as a quick attachment point for carabiners and other quick disconnect systems.

Titanium alloy does not equal titanium. Sure, you say. Who doesn't know that. This guy, until two glasses of whiskey prompted boasting about the cool titanium key ring I have that is better than yours.

Yup, that key ring is now a spiral laying on the table waiting for me to sober up and walk it to the trash bin. There was more tension at my prom date's house than in this formed bit of metal, and I was a complete gentleman.

So, to sum up: it looks good, it is light weight and it does work. It probably would have lasted through the end of the year if I hadn't wanted to show off. That'll teach me to think myself superior, I'm going to look for a stronger key ring.

reviewText: Great more lace then thoguht though

I bought this for my daughter, thinking we might use it for her upcoming Quinceaera for the Dama dresses.  We didn't want to buy all 7 in case the dress wasn't the quality we were hoping for.  Thankfully, we made the right decision.  This dress is made from a material that is see through.  The top of the dress is basically see through lace.  Then there is some coverage from the bra line down to about 4 inches above the knee, where an underlay dress is sewn inside - that's gotta be the strangest thing and it makes you wonder WHAT were they thinking???  The exterior flowing portion of the dress is again all see through, but it goes all the way down to the ground.  Why wouldn't you sew the underlay down to the same level as the exterior, especially when it's going to be blatantly see through and you will be able to see only a short skirt underneath?  It looks absolutely ridiculous.  The fabric came apart slightly in the back just from her trying it on as the zipper is sticky, which makes it difficult to maneuver and easy to damage.  I'm not sure what we'll do with it.  I figure we'll try to be creative and see if we can purchase extra fabric or find a very long slip to wear beneath, but I'm not sure it will be something we'll be able to salvage.  We learned our lesson on this one!  Also, the shipping takes quite a while.  When they say it's going to take a while, it really will take a while to come in.  It was shipped from overseas.
summary: If something sounds too good to be true, it's probably too good to be true.

I'm not too thrilled with these warm-up pants because of the chord design the wearer must use to keep them up. It's a "single cord" design that makes it difficult to tie any type of not that will keep them up, and the elastic waist band is too flimsy to keep them up on its own - or for that matter, strong enough to do so even in connection with any knot you manage to come up with.

To make matters worse, the string used to secure the pants is made of such a flimsy material that any knot strong enough to hold the pants up for more than 2 minutes before coming apart is impossible to untie. After spending several minutes to untie the knot, it gets so frayed that it may break after repeating the process 2 or 3 times.

Because these pants cost more than others Champion sells, I was expecting a slightly better product than others they sell. While I have some other Champion sweat pants I purchased several years ago, I can't fathom why they didn't simply continue selling those and changed their design...doing so was a very poor decision on Champion's part. To sum things up, don't purchase these sweat pants!

reviewText: Luv the color of the bag. Just luv the soft leather.  It was a little smaller than I expected and to what I am use to.  I'm a big bag kinda girl. The inside could use some upgrades. Not as roomy as the picture shows it out to be.  The outside zippers are are pretty small. Not much can be fit in them.  The center zipper inside the bag is also pretty small.  I have an iPhone 6 Plus with a Defender case on it and the phone does not fit in any of the zipper compartments.  I have a Yahoho wallet that doesn't fit in any of the zipper compartments.  What's the point of having so many zipper compartments if they're too small to use.  I also like to wear my bags close to my upper body.  Don't like the long shoulder bag look. The strap does have enough holes to make it short enough but once it's on the last hole the rest of the strap is left dangling.  You can't tuck it back into the strap loop.  Call me OCD but I like to wear my bags neatly.  Overall not what I expected but I'll stick with it just for the color and the feel of the leather.
summary: Beautiful looking bag but don't get fooled by the Roomy Pics!

I call this my "Mystery Mala" since I didn't know I was getting it. I went out to My Orders to check on a book I'd ordered for a friend only to find that I could look to be receiving this mala the next day! Well, knock me over with a feather -- I hadn't known  I'd ordered any mala, though I'd had malas on my mind and had been looking at them recently, and had put one I liked on my wish list. Still, I'm very familiar with ordering on line, and don't have the one touch activated.  I sat, chin in hand and thought, maybe this is one of those instances where you need to concede that the Universe is alive and well, and you might now come back to chanting mantras (used to, mala stolen in purse robbery 25 yrs. ago ) so I thought I'd see about this particular mala. It arrived as stated, and I looked it over, and decided yes, I will keep this, and I think I am meant to have it.  I probably would never have ordered a mala strung on elastic, but with careful and respectful use, I think they will hold up just fine. I got the Tree of Life bead marker by default, and like using that when I can't complete the full 108 beads at one sitting.  The green sandalwood is probably not from the sandalwood family, and the scent -- who knows? It certainly isn't real sandalwood scent --  my loved and stolen mala was real sandalwood so I know the difference.  The beads themselves are quite beautiful with a lot of variation in the grain, and the greenish tone is much appreciated by me. So that's my take on these.  Nothing like some mystery to life, I say.
summary: Don't Know How I Got 'Em But They're Here to Stay

The top is where the problem was!  The cups fit fine and the straps were great since it can fit just about anyone.  It can really lift them, which is needed for bigger chested women or nursing moms.  The middle portion of the bra is HORRIBLE though!  My breasts are closer centered on my chest, so they kept coming out the front when I went to the ocean.  There is no way to tie or tighten the front middle so I was stuck making sure my boobs weren't out and about the whole time I wore this.

I'll re-buy if they fix the bra issue.  Not before.

I have bought a few of these shirts now because they fit so well and look great.  I chose the option that it fit as expected because I had a couple dockers brand shirts of the same style and this fit exactly the same.  That being said, I bought a small, when I usually wear a medium.  This is the perfect size for me.  I can tuck it into khakis for work, but it isn't too long to leave untucked to wear with jeans or shorts to go out in.  I have about a 31 inch waist and a slightly muscular upper body and arms.  The fit is great all around.  I can roll the sleeves neatly to the top of my forearm and they remain there quite nicely.  Overall, this is a great shirt at a pretty reasonable price.  I bought 3 on prime day, so I saved 30%.  But if they were not on sale, I still would have purchased these shirts because of the quality and fit.
summary: Great shirt, looks sharp, the fit is consistent with other dockers sizes, but runs somewhat large otherwise

reviewText:
I love these shoes!  Please see my full review by Googling my name (Matt Sheeks) and "Scott T2 Palani 2.0 Review."

- Nice compromise between cushioning and weight.
- Neutral shoe but seems to work okay for mild pronators such as myself
- Large surface area on the sole which provides excellent ground-feel and stability
- Great Durability especially for a lightweight trainer
- Useful for fast running or trail running where one does not want to be encumbered by a full training shoe
- Useful for hiking and strength training where one wants more flexible, less clunky shoes
- Only Con: Laces don't stay tied even when double-knotted
- Size 9s weigh in at 10 ounces  roughly 2 oz. lighter than a normal training shoe
- My overall score: 9.5/10

I noticed that made in China crap often has major manufacturing issues, especially unfixed dyes, but this was the worst I have seen. I'm getting my money back for the other shirt that never came, thanks but no thanks.

reviewText:
This hat is nice looking in a rural Maine woodsman sort of way. Looks just like the online picture. The fur inside is only on the ear flaps and extends about 2" up in the rear. Other than that there is no fur inside, but the inside is fully lined. One of the two straps can be shortened, but the other has a fixed length of 3".

I'm an average size man and I think my head is average size, but this hat is really too large for me. When I first put it on, fur was partially obscuring my vision. Trimming back the front edge of the fur to the stitching helped here. For good warmth you want the ear flaps to pull tight to the face, but in my case that means pulling the two flaps nearly together under the chin, and the 3" fixed strap length prevents this. If I push the hat back so I can clearly see, it will stay for a while before it needs another push, so it's OK for a job like hand snow shoveling, but not for driving.
summary: Nice hat, but too large on me

Hopefully, during the winter, the material will keep me warmer than my hoodies do.

reviewText: This is a stylish rose gold and brown ceramic ring. I was looking for something in this color scheme to match a beautiful Bulova watch when I came across some Bering jewelry. I got the ring and also the matching earrings. My wife absolutely loved the set. I think it looks better on her than on the pictures. We're very happy with it. The only thing I didn't like is the packaging: a cheap paper box and a plastic bag, but that's not what really matters.

reviewText: I bought this jacket in store at half the price, so I would recommend looking and trying this jacket on in person first before paying full retail value. It's a cute and warm jacket, but it runs a little small. I'm 5'9 150 pounds and usually wear a large in all northface jackets, but the shoulders felt a little stiff in a large and when I put my arms up the length was too short. But an extra large fixed the shoulder issue and only an inch or so peeked out when I held my arms out, so maybe that's what I get for having long arms. So taller women beware. But otherwise, it's thick enough to do well in typical Seattle weather (30-50 degrees or so). Anything cooler I will layer, especially since it has no hood.

I am a huge fan of Thom Browne but his sunglasses are complete crap, especially for the price.  I recently received a pair as a gift ($800 retail) and immediately noticed how cheap the workmanship appeared to be.  I thought I might be overreacting but when I took them to an optometry shop for prescription lenses, they were in complete agreement.  They laughed at the price. The knowledgeable store owner pointed out the cheapness of the materials, the cheap hinges, even the poor quality of the lenses.  What a disgrace to the brand name!  Thom, please look at the quality of the things you put your name on!

Side pockets are suitable for holding a water bottle and a 700 page paperback, although with no stretch you might find that limiting if you need something with grip. The lining seems a little thin, but the exterior is a durable canvas, and did I mention SPACE? :)

I fell in love with this purse as soon as I saw it. It is feminine but it makes a point. The colors are bright, yet not overpowering.  The hardware, so to speak, are solid, well made and striking. There are several well placed compartments, and although the purse is very roomy, it is not ostentatious. It is well worth the price just for the purse and you still get matching sunglasses and a wallet. And the wallet, like the purse is very well made. Just like my other purchase, I have already had compliments on it and requests for info on how to order it. I have started keeping the info in my phone to give out. I would buy this purse again and already have my eye on another one from the same sellers. This was well packed, all hardware was covered. You will have regrets if you miss out on this, it is a great buy and quick delivery as well. Great purchase!
summary: You will love this purse, it is a bargain!

reviewText: Perfect shoe. Just what I was looking for. The price couldn't be beat.

I love shoes with some height, but without much heel rise. Was concerned about ordering these due to reviews about durability. I find these fit somewhat narrow. The 10 is great for my 10AA foot. Maybe that's why people are breaking straps if they have M to W feet. Haven't worn them much, so will update if I find a durability problem. So far, so good.

I was not a fan of the white sides, so decided to try making them black. See photo. I used a wide tip permanent black marks-a-lot, which definitely doesn't rub off. I put on 3 coats. As you can see in the pic with the marker, the first coat streaks. I did 2 horizontal coats and 1vertical coat. I really pushed hard on the marker to get the black in around the straps. I had to shake the marker often and doodle on scrap paper to keep the ink flowing. Be aware that if you go over a spot before it is dry (1-2 mins), it will be sticky and streak worse. I did not color the bottom of the shoes. Have already gotten compliments about how great they look. Project took about an hour.

I also have these in tan, and am debating whether to make the sides brown or leave them white :-)

Con:

reviewText: Bought as a gift for a friend who is color blind.  He said some colors looked sharper but didn't make a big difference.  When I try them it looks similar to looking thru a pair of polarized sun glasses.  Not very impressive for the money.

I thought I had already reviewed this product, but I guess not.  OK, first let me start by saying the quality of these glasses is excellent and the communication with the company is fast and very response and helpful.  These were a surprise gift for my husband from the family (myself, kids and grandsons).  He was very touched by it.  Unfortunately, they did  not work for him.  He could only see a slight difference in the brightness of some colors, but it wasn't enough of a change for the price.  Our colorblind grandson also tried them on and did not notice anything either, but that may be because he is 7 years old.  HOWEVER, I did not want to give these glasses a low rating just because they did not work for us. They work for LOTS of other people so give them a try.  With their 60 day money back guarantee if the glasses are still in good condition you cannot go wrong.  My husband has a severe case of color blindness so he only had a small percentage of a chance they would work for him.  That's not a reason for a low rating for the company.  I would recommend anyone wanting to see colors like they should be seen give them a try.  You might be one of the lucky ones.  :-)

Where do I begin?  This thing is either not as described, or exactly as described, depending on how you look at it.  It is literally two crossed bands of fabric that aren't woven together in any way.  How do you wear it to make it look like it does in the picture?  Well, that's impossible to tell because the packaging and labels are all in Japanese.  I stuck my arms and head in various loops several different ways, and every time, a boob popped out.  Also, the sequins don't come close to covering all the fabric.  There's lame black cotton on a large portion of it.  That's really a secondary issue considering the fact that there's no way for a human person to wear it without getting arrested on obscenity charges, but it's another lame drawback to this terrible product.  Overall, in the 5 years I have had Amazon Prime, this is one of the two worst items I have ever ordered, the other being a too-thin shower curtain that suction-cupped itself to my legs every time I showered.

Nice clean look, plenty of pockets, but could be a little bigger in order to fit lunch, 1 L sized water bottle, and other necessities for a middle school student.  I carefully measured and compared this to other backpacks we own and it is still a bit smaller than I hoped.

I thought this was a great backpack. It was a little smaller than I expected, but I'm a pretty petite person, so for a 22-year old female college student it was ok. I ordered the lavender color, but it is more vivid and brighter in person, more of a orchid color rather than a pastel. What mattered the most to me in this backpack was water bottle pockets, a laptop sleeve, fashionable design, and something waterproof. This checks all those boxes. The water bottle pockets have velcro on the inside, and are pretty small, which is kind of a pain, and the laptop sleeve is in the back, so it can be tricky to get a laptop in and out if you pack it full, but other than those slight grievances, this is awesome. I have carried this in the rain and nothing has seeped through into the inside at all. I also like the big front pocket. My laptop fits perfectly (I have a 15 in. If you have anything bigger it won't fit). I have been able to stuff a laptop, a change or clothes, lunchbag, and textbooks. It was tight, but it worked. It also came with a cute little pencil case! This is definitely a good buy for the money. Nothing is falling apart, and the zipper never gets stuck. I've had it for a month now and love it!

Ive been using this for 3 weeks now. Purchase the black one.
Delivery: Ordered 7/7 and was delivered 7/10.
Packaging: Great, no complaints.
Setup: Easy to use with English user guide.
Functions:
- Date/Time/Temp: Updated via syncing with the app.
- Steps: Accurate.
- Calories: The app is able to calculate your idle calories and will then add up the burned calories to give you a total amount.
- Distance moved: I guess this is calculated via how many steps youve taken.
- Cycling: Only available after updating the firmware. Does not work with stationery cycling as nothing was registered after my spinning class.
- Minutes: How many minutes youve moved, guess this is also calculated via how many steps youve taken.
- Idle time: Ive set this to 1hr, and it will alert me if Ive been sitting for that long.
- Sleep Mode: Before firmware update, sleep mode was accessible by 2 long presses. After firmware update, sleep mode is only accessible via the app.
- Stop watch time: Before firmware update, the timer was only accessible via the app. After firmware update, the time is accessible by 2 long presses.
- Alarm: This can be set via the app.
- Caller alert: Need to have BT always ON on your phone, but Ive noticed the wristband only alerting me after the phone has rung a few seconds already.
- Heartrate: The wristband itself cannot monitor your heartrate. The app does have this function and how it calculates your heartrate is by asking you to place your finger on your phones camera. Quite interesting, though I cant say how accurate this is.
- SMS alert: Cannot comment as I haven't tested this function.
Battery: Lasts about 8-9 days straight. Charging takes about 1hr.
Waterproof: Ive only run it under the tap after the gym, no issues here. Have not tested it in the pool.
Size: I have a very small wrist and the wristband is able to fit me well.
Disadvantages:
- As Ive mentioned above, it does not record my time from my spinning classes.
- As I sit in the office all day typing on a keyboard, the paint has started to come off the clip that locks the wristband from scratching against the surface of my desk.
- Before updating the firmware, I found that the wristband restarted on its own one night while it was in Sleep Mode, thus it lost some data. This has only happened once so far, not sure if the firmware update fixed it or not.
Questions: Ive found that sometimes the wristband will vibrate and a picture of a fist showing up. Do not know what this means and its not explained in the user guide either.

reviewText: Beautiful handmade set! I am gifting mine to a mom to be and I am sure she's going to love it. Great quality!

I love to give a mom-to-be a gift that is original and one she won't get duplicates of.  That's why I knew this would be the perfect item when I was given the chance to purchase it at a special price to test for quality.  Amulets have been used for centuries to bring fortune and prosperity to people as well as providing protection.

 This three piece set comes in a very sturdy box complete with elasticized ribbon.  Inside, you will find the a pin with four charms for the mother to accessorize any outfit with.  There is also a set of knotted adjustable bracelets for mother and baby.  Knots are thought to catch evil spirits. The third item is a beaded bracelet with an evil eye amulet.  While this is super cute, I would only put it on my baby for pictures or to show people.  It is not adjustable and could be removed causing a choking hazard.  That particular bracelet may be better suited for a toddler more so than a baby.

If you are looking for an original gift, this is definitely something you should check out.

Pretty dress... the print on the fabric is a little fuzzy, which I don't love and makes it look a little cheap, but it looks nice from a distance.

I'm not really sure why it would be so difficult for the description / drop down menu to include size conversions, but it doesn't, so here it is.  This chart is completely accurate and if you wear one of these sizes, you should follow it:

XL = UK 16 = US 12
2X = UK 18 = US 14
3X = UK 20 = US 16
4X = UK 22 = US 18

I would normally wear a 16, and the description did say to size up, so I ordered a 2X (which is sizing up from a 16 under normal circumstances).  But here, the 2X is equivalent to a US 14. Nowhere is this stated, which is ridiculous.  Why can't Amazon just PUT UK 18 (or US 14) instead of 2X in the drop down menu?  Otherwise, I have no idea if the 2X is according to UK sizing or if it has been converted to US sizing already.

Had it been listed this way, I would have known that the 2X / 14 was a bit of a long shot for me as my bust measurement makes it difficult for me to wear below a dress size 16.  As it is, the dress won't quite zip on me and I will be sending back.  I'm ok with this, I just don't understand WHY the accurate size can't be listed in the drop down menu.  The dress AND the bag it arrived in both indicate it is a UK 18.  That is the size that should be listed before I purchase.
summary: UK Sizing, read my review for size conversions

Well, first these are sunglasses not shoes, so I am skipping the width and arch support questions!  These are great sunglasses that I bought specifically for golf.  They use a different technique to cut glare, melanin in the lenses and not polarization.  Some indication of glare can help in reading greens, and polarization tends to completely remove that.  The melanin lenses cut most of the glare but leave enough to help reading greens. I love this scrub cap. I use it as a night cap. It stay on and in place and keeps my hair looking great.

Im a nurse using this GUOER SCRUB HAT in the cardiac cath lab. I love it! No problems keeping it secure during long sterile procedures, patient accessments, or excessive sweating. The front portion can be rolled up/down to accommodate preference and forehead height. I personally roll mine up about halfway. The fabric strings tie easily in the back. I have short hair and my ponytail is only about 1 long. I can tuck the ponytail into this scrub hat, and have no problems with my hair escaping out the back. Also, I have received several compliments on this GUOER SCRUB HAT! I am actually ordering another pattern today!
summary: EXCELLENT SCRUB HAT FOR THIS CATH LAB NURSE

I LOVE THESE SOCKS! I received these as a free gift when I purchased my Vero Monte no show socks for my Tieks and I am in love! The no show socks were great, and so are these! The material is fantastic - very soft, which is a surprise because socks like this that I have had in the past have been sort of rough. No these - they are soft and the perfect thickness. They don't feel so thick that your shoes fit tighter, but I really like the way they feel under my boots.
Another pro - I am very picky about seams in my socks. I find that often the seam irritates my toes and I have to either turn them inside out or take them off altogether. The seams on these are perfect, I spent the entire day in them (12+ hours on my feet) with no irritation or even marks when I took them off! If you struggle with the seams hurting you, these are great!
Also, the packaging was so cute for these! They came nicely rolled and wrapped in a box with tissue paper, which actually gave me the idea to order some as gifts because who doesn't like socks?! I've already recommended them to my friends/coworkers, who also purchased the no show socks based on my recommendation.

My socks will definitely be coming from Vero Monte from now on. I wish they made white cotton socks also! This is a great company with exceptional customer service - something rarely seen these days. Make some kids socks, Vero Monte, so I can order them for my kids too!
Good quality, comfortable and warm.

After buying some vero monte no show socks they sent me this set of four warm socks for free and asked if I could write a review. I hadn't invested much in these kinds of socks but now that I've tried them I find myself searching for one of these pairs almost every day. They are warm, not scratchy, look fun, and they don't slip off like a lot of long socks. I don't know what size they sent me so I just guessed "fit as expected". And after finding out the cost I think it is a fair price to ask $3.25/pair for the value.
summary: warm, not scratchy, look fun, and they don't slip off

I ordered some other socks at the same time from another company and I can never find the matches. I LOVE having four socks of the same color!

Because their packaging is pretty, they would make a great present for someone too.  I won't hesitate to order them again.

reviewText:
I absolutely love these socks. I wear size 11N shoes, and these socks are great!  I have trouble finding socks large enough for my feet, so having something that not only fits (which is wonderful) but is also comfortable, attractive, and fun is very special for me. My feet stay fairly warm most of the time, and the socks are just right for keeping my feet warm but not making them hot in cold weather. I also love the way the socks come packaged: in a sturdy box with each pair rolled and wrapped with a paper band.
I had a little problem with my order, but I contacted Vero Monte and the very helpful Elizabeth responded incredibly fast and took care of the problem right away.
I couldn't be happier with the socks. In fact, I am ordering a slightly different style of Vero Monte in a "boxed set" for my sister for Christmas.
summary: An extremely satisfied customer! Thank you, Vero Monte!

First, the image of model in the shirt is different than the image of the shirt on a mannequin, and happily, the shirt I received has the neckline pictured on the model, which I prefer. However, I ordered a Large/US M, because viewing the shirt from the side (on the mannequin) made it appear to be quite loose, and I figured smaller would be better. I am typically between a US M and a L, depending on the cut of the shirt. In this case, I definitely should've got the XL/L, as this shirt is a bit clinger than I would like, possibly due to the cheap jet set/polyester lining.

Overall, the design is super cute and I'm sure I would like it if it was a size larger and didn't cling to my belly. :/ Additionally, the quality is not great (but for the price, I suppose you're not expecting high quality). The lining is simply serged around the bottom--not folded and stitched like a well finished garment would be--and because of this, the lining tends to roll up, particularly in the back, which doesn't look great. I think the shirt will work tucked in, but I wouldn't wear it loose, as pictured without getting a size up.
summary: Picture on the model--not the mannequin--is the item I recieved.

reviewText: Love these pants. Great material. White pants are a little see thru but not too bad. Be careful when cutting if too long don't cut them too short!

I own several pairs of these and will be back for more! The fabric is soft and silky, lightweight yet sturdy, and not at all see-thru. My waist is 28", my hips are 36", and the small fits me perfectly. Since I need an inseam longer than average but shorter than "tall", I just love that these are made long and designed to be cut to your desired length - no sewing required! The length on the black pair I received measures 32" and the printed pair measures 33", but the weight and stretch of the fabric causes them to drape about 1 1/2" longer when you have them on - so they are closer to 33 1/2" and 34 1/2".  Best of all: I have some tummy troubles, so I wear them with the fold-over not folded over, which brings it up to my bra. This gives me a smoother line through my midsection, helps control the jigglies (slightly), is still comfortable when I get bloated, and yet is not at all tight or binding like a compression garment. That, right there, is priceless! With repeated washings these do get looser, so to extend their lifespan I wash them in cold water and wouldn't dream of putting them in the dryer. If/when these do lose elasticity, I plan on getting more wear out of them by then wearing them as intended (folded over). The only minus is that they are not pattern matched, but that is something I know not to expect at this price, so I still give them five stars.

We were thrilled when the package came with a beautifully made dress.  It looks great on her.  The color is a little more mint green than in the picture but we were prepared for a variation-- it is still lovely and no regrets. The buttons on the back make it look exquisite.  We were also worried it would not arrive in time (May 1) since I ordered it kind of late.  But once it shipped, it was here in no time.  Couldn't be more pleased.  We ordered according to the size chart to fit her waist since she is smaller on top.  We will have to have the top altered a bit to fit but it is better than the waist not being big enough.  So order to fit the largest area of your body size wise and alter the rest accordingly. That would be the way to order any dress that is not custom made.

The details on this bra are outstanding!  It is soft and comfortable to wear. It makes my "gals" look nice and perky, which after having 2 kids, is no easy task! The straps are adjustable and do so easily. I was able to find a great fit with minimal work on the straps. It has 3 hook and eye closures in the back. They stay closed all day without any trouble. The plunging neck line makes this a great choice to wear with a low neck dress or blouse.
I have washed and dried this bra several times already. It is holding up great! Each time I washed it in a laundry bag and hung to dry. The underwire is not poking through at all! I will say that this does run small. I would recommend carefully reading the sizing instructions and take that into consideration. I ordered a cup and one size bigger and it fits great.
Overall, this super sexy bra is wonderful! I would recommend it to my family and friends! I received this product in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: Awful. Cheap cheap fabric. Returning item

I received this as a review sample and thought it would be a novelty more than a functional timepiece. I was wrong. While I still rely on my phone's clock this watch is perfect for camping, hiking and similar activities.

One of the things that I love is the fact that it has the look of an analog watch, but is brimming with digital features as well. I mention the analog part because at 66 (at the time of this review) I grew up in an era where all watches were analog and there is an imprinted relationship between the position of the hands and the time of day. I suspect many folks in my age group can 'visualize' time better that way.

Of course, the biggest draw for me is the price. If I were to break or lose this watch I am not going to have an anxiety attack. Lose it I may, but I doubt if this think will break easily. It's water and dust proof, and seems to be relatively shock proof as well.

It's a bit large, but not unduly uncomfortable to wear, especially for the short periods that I use it. Bottom line is it's accurate since it has a digital movement, is packed with features that you can read in the description, and nearly indestructible. And, of course, inexpensive.
summary: Vintage look with modern features and functions

reviewText:
What we have here is a product of sufficient quality that is not accurately sized. I bought Better Wear Boys Thermal Underwear Set in color Medium Blue Size 24M for my daughter to wear as pajamas. I compared this to other size 24M clothing and it was apparent right away that these thermal underwear run very small. And with 60% of the content being cotton it was even worse after washing and drying. The fabric is soft. The material has a bit of stretch to it so if it were the right size it would be comfortable to sleep in. My daughter ended up with an outfit for her cabbage patch doll after all was said and done. I gave it 4 stars instead of 3 because we still found use for the product after our daughter couldn't wear it.

I was provided this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest unbiased evaluation.
summary: Sizing Inaccuracy & Shrinking Led To This Product Being An Outfit For One Of My Daughter's Dolls...

reviewText:
I ordered the size 24months in blue and I would say it is pretty true to size but if your little one is any older than 24 months it could be on the smaller side. I don't want to say that it runs small but perhaps somewhat small. The material is thin (its not the thick thermal underwear) and I would say it is a bit more on the stiff side rather than the super soft side. The color looks just like the Amazon photo as well. It is good for an added layer or they could be worn alone as pajamas. I have washed these on cold mostly and warm, I dried them on normal and I did notice a little shrinking so I may line dry them from now on. Overall they are a good added layer and I would say they are comparable to what you would find at your local budget stores.
I ordered this at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: Nice Set for an Extra Layer

reviewText: Warm winters ahead for baby!  I got this for a family in need, and when I took it to them, it just so happened to be one of those rainy and windy days so they immediately wanted to put their son in it.  He is a healthy 2 year old, and this fit with just a little bit of room to grow into.  The stitching and quality looks excellent and from just feeling it (before i washed it for them), it is a nice thermal feel.  I've got my own set of thermal undies that keep me quite warm, and when compared to this one, feels like he'll have a nice warm winter ahead!  Washed up nicely and I was able to dry it and it seems to still fit nicely.  I did receive this set at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: great for the cold nights for baby!

As far as the ring, I happened to open it despite the packaging being torn (packaging is of little concern to me). The real problem was when I did open the package it came in, The ring was not put together, pieces 1 & 4 were perfectly intact, needed some minor adjustments easy to fix with a mandrel and needle nose pliers - piece 3 was warped to where it had to be completely flattened and wrapped around a mandrel in order to fix it. Here's the problem, Piece 2 had a large crack in it when I attempted to fix it, it broke. So instead of a 4 piece ring, I ended up with a 3 piece ring that I had to spend an hour fixing. Even now that it's fixed I enjoy it very much, Just be aware you get what you pay for, the ring material is easy to break if you aren't gentle with it, and takes a lot of patience to fix should it arrive damaged. Overall, 3/5 stars.

reviewText:
The actual charm is nice. It's a shiny silver necklace with a dark black pawprint. However, whoever designed the "fill kit" (tiny funnel) for this doesn't understand how cremated remains work. They are not a uniform size. Sometimes there are slightly larger chunks, making it difficult to get the remains through the excessively long, tiny funnel end. Unless their goal was to add a lot of stress and pain to an already painful occurrence by forcing the owners of deceased pets to painstakingly cram their pet's remains into a tiny locket with their fingers, they have failed at their job. It took me a good 45 minutes to get this tiny chamber filled, and I had to use my fingers. I'm not squeamish, but I know that plenty of people would not be comfortable having their dead dog's ashes all over their fingers and work area. I also don't mind having lost a little bit of my girl, but I bet some people would.

IF you have already purchased this, here is my suggestion for filling. Discard the funnel. It will clog and become a nuisance immediately and repeatedly. Prop the urn up so it sits (securely) vertically however you can. Get an index card. Scoop a *very* small amount of your pet's remains onto it. Sort through the remains looking for larger bits that won't make it through the opening of the charm. Move those elsewhere with tweezers or something. crease the card and gently pour the remains into the urn over a piece of paper (to catch what doesn't go into the opening). You will probably need a needle or similar tool to sort of coax the ashes to fall in. Repeat until full.

I'm going to try to tell you about everything I wondered when I was thinking of purchasing this bag. I won't lie; when I received it, I contemplated sending it back. It ended up growing on me though. The leather is nice and it's an overall beautiful bag. And it's very roomy. It could actually be used as a weekender. For anyone wondering, the hardware is gunmetal. I like that; wasn't wanting goldtone.

So, why not 5 stars? Well:

1. It doesn't have a top zipper. But the straps are actually functional where they pull in the "wings" and secure the bag just like the real phantom.

2. The lining is a vinyl material. It isn't thin though.

3. I wish it had more pockets. It only has one zipper pocket inside, and one on the outside.

4. The bottom of the bag seems to bow a little bit when items are placed in it. Wish the bottom construction was more sturdy.

5. The feet are black plastic. I hoped that they would be the same metal used for the hardware.

I'm actually used to carrying brands such as MK and Coach normally, but this bag is proving that it can definitely stand on its own. I love the fact that I can throw everything in it and keep on going.

Just a note: be careful of stretching out the zipper pockets. I can't get the inside pocket to zip normally right now; the teeth come apart after being zipped.

Ralph Lauren dress shirts are so well made and last years, even at weekly washings. I am so glad to see Amazon carrying them. At 100% cotton, button-down collars, buttoned placket, barrel cuffs and a nice split back yoke with a box pleat, these are professional shirts.

There are a variety of styles to choose from, but the right sizes are not always available. Usually the most popular shirts sell out of popular sizes quickly. But when bought from this site, you save a lot of money and a trip to the mall or store. Any Ralph Lauren dress shirt under one-hundred dollars is a deal. I only buy my shirts from this site and they really do last years.
summary: Great Quality On A Long Lasting Shirt

These socks are perfect for what sports.  They fit as expected for me, with that being said allow me to explain.  I'm a size 11 and ordered Large (10-13).  These fit tight, but they're suppose to fit tight.  When running, turning, twisting, you don't want loose socks that will turn and twist opposite your feet causing discomfort and blisters.  These fit perfectly snug.  The color options are awesome too.  This are comparable to anything put out by Nike and Under Armour, but I prefer them because they feel a tad bit thicker.  Not thick enough to cause more heat to build up but thick enough to offer more support.

Horrible quality. I purchased this because of the color and the price but boy, they don't lie when they say that you get what you pay for. First of all,  almost right out of the package, as I ran my fingers across the fabric I noticed these slight bumps along the seams of the already fraying and loosening golden threads. Upon closer inspection the bumps turned out to be a thick hardened black adhesive of some sort. Within an  hour of doing my own alterations for a project, most of the seams had been unraveling,  even places I hadn't touched. Bottom line, buy American (or just something better quality) and don't waste your money.

reviewText: I chose this item because I can't carry a purse to work. I like this product but after 3rd day of unzipping the zipper messed up. So I now have to be careful how far I unzip it or it will not zip back up.

When you open it up, there are three sections; one for your cards, which there are two slot areas. The second section consist of a zipper section with two sides inside. To me, this is the most secure area becuase of the zipper for money and coins. The last section in the back is where your phone can be stored. However, I don't use it for that. I just put coupons and other things back there. Be aware the section is not very secure. So, if you put change back there, it will fall out from the little spaces below.

I've had this wallet for about half a year and it STILL looks very good. There are no tears and wears. I got mines from EBAY for around 5 bucks, free shipping.

2/14/14 Update
I did discover that even from the middle zipper section, some coins can still slip from under and into the back area. Ugh. Anyway, It's best to get a little coin pouch you can hook it up with then to rely on coins for this wallet.

2/15/14
While I was in the store, my coins kept falling out onto the floor. Sometimes we're very quick with shoving stuff in our wallets, but this lets you know that the back part of the wallet is VERY unreliable for coins. Just wanted to point that out.

reviewText:
I bought this for my husband as a temporary replacement wedding ring because he lost his original wedding ring. I was surprised with how beautiful this ring is when it arrived and my husband LOVES it! He says the ceramic band is much more comfortable than the tungsten band he had before. He also likes that, since it's made of ceramic, it can be cut off in case he injures his hand and it needs to be removed. I had never considered that with tungsten rings - they cannot be cut or resized, so if you were to injure your hand (Google "ring avulsion injuries" but be ready for graphic pictures!) and your ring cannot be taken off or removed (like tungsten rings), amputating the finger is very likely.
I think this will be a long term ring for my husband instead of a temporary replacement! And if fits true to size!
Great product - much better than imagined - perfect!

I was excited when I came across these shoes in Citrine since I've been searching for a comfortable bright yellow summer sandal for awhile now. I'd previously purchased Oka-B's Emery style and found them to be quite comfortable, so I thought these Carson sandals would be perfect. I received them yesterday and excitedly tried them on, only to find that they weren't everything I'd hoped they'd be. Oka-B's Emery style has a blue insole that's soft, squishy and supportive. These Carson sandals, however, are made entirely of plastic/rubber with no soft, supportive insole. There is some arch support, but not enough to be effective unless you have low arches. It was quite stiff and surprisingly heavy, and the thong piece between the toes was uncomfortable. Overall, NOT the light, comfy sandal I'd anticipated. Returned immediately and continuing my yellow sandal search.

reviewText: a little big but i love it..

I ordered a Medium (I looked at the comments and decided that I'd try it out because it seemed that people wanted it to be tighter) I usually wear medium because I don't like to wear tight clothing and it fits fine. I have kind of broad shoulders so the top part doesn't go as far out on them as I'd like but it's still nice. It's not a suuuper nice top but the material listings feel about right. For the washing... READ THE INSTRUCTIONS. I can tell people here didn't do that. It says to wash cold separately and no to tumble dry. That means delicate cycle with lowest spin (I do some spin because then it takes a while for the water to drain otherwise) and then hang it to dry. If you wash things like that, the fabric doesn't come undone. Also try not to wash it with anything that could get caught on the lace part (as in zippers, sequins, and buttons) Yes, that's kind of high maintenance but that's what you need to do with lace. Really nice top and fast delivery (ordered may 30th and received June 2nd. I live in northern CA- south bay area)
summary: Nice top, fast delivery. Read instructions for care!

reviewText: Great shirt if your 12 and order the xxxl

The quality of these dress shirts is laughable at best. And, I am no clothing snob. Purchased these for my husband to wear to our anniversary vacation, and I wouldn't send my grandpa to the store in these things. These seriously look like "an old man trying to be cool" shirts. Think, "truck driver"- and I mean no disrespect to truck drivers.  The material, described as "Cotton Blend," must be 1% cotton mixed with 99% of the cheapest polyester imaginable. The material is see through thin, and the shiny metal buttons look like they came off my grandma's Asian buffet. The dark blue design isn't as awful as the light blue design, as you can't see the "plaid" so much. I thought the plaid would be an embroidered type stitch, or a nice quality print at the least- it's not. And on the light blue shirt, the design is in black, not navy. At $18 bucks a pop (about what I can purchase a NICE men's dress shirt for at TJ Maxx, Ross, or Marshall's,) this is a severe disappointment. I will be returning these. I gave two stars as the XXL fit my 6'1", 190 lb husband well, Amazon shipped quickly, and they look far better in photographs than in person.

Sizing is not even remotely close. XXL would be more accurately labeled as a Large at best. Very low quality materials. Most buttons felt like they were close to falling off right out of the box and the fabric is just about paper thin. Returning immediately.

I love my chemo beanies! I have them in all kinds of colors. I started losing my hair when I was 18 due to pcos. My hair thining is to the point now that I need to have a cap on in the summer when outside or my scalp burns. I'm 32  with three kids and live an active life. I have tried many things wigs, hats, scarves, bandanas. These have been the best. They fit my head snugly, but not tight. They are light and airy feeling, so my head doesn't get hot feeling like in a wig, yet blocks the sun so my scalp stays happy. I feel like I can go to the park and then inside without the need to take it off like I would with a hat. I don't need to try and line up the pattern and try and tie it even like a bandana. And I don't have the weight of a full scarf on my neck. These really have been such a happy life changer. The hardest part is picking which one goes with the outfit I'm wearing that day.

That was only my second time putting on the dress so I was pretty annoyed. Overall it was a decent buy, but I'll be contacting the seller for a price adjustment given the hole.

Pros...

The sheer back makes you feel sexy

Cons..
The material is not suitable for hot climates or the summer time
The train is way too long
The sew in cups are cream colored and NOT suitable for people with darker complexion.
The sew in cups are pointy (some breasts may be pointy, but mine are round so I needed to replace the cups).

The dress itself is nice and looks good, but mine had some essential flaws that made me return it!
1 - the zipper - annoying and clearly something that would give me problems. Also, the description says "Back: Zipper". There is no back zipper, only one on the side.
2 - I thought my boob was showing a bit too much. The cup would cover it when someone looked straight at me, but from my side, I thought people could see more than I wished to show.
3 - the champagne lace thing (there are no stone application or anything, it is all fabric) works beautifully with the fabric, but mine was not properly centered in the dress, which made it look cheaply made - this was my biggest no-no of all of them. If I paid $40, I would get it, but for $100, not a chance!!! The applications were not straight and definitely not symmetric, which, again, made it look cheap (the ones around the hips, not the bottom)
I do have a couple good things to say about it, which justify my three stars, even though I chose to return it
1 - the color was very true to what the picture showed, which was nice
2 - the fabric hugged my body and it made the silhouette really nice, curvy where it should be, but in a classy way
3 - the bottom is beautiful. Sadly, not enough to compensate for the other flaws.
Basically, I returned it because I thought that, for this price, it was not worth it. They have some options in most sizes with free returns. If, like me, you think it would look great and want to chance it, I would recommend trying one of those. The returning process takes a while, but I knew I would not stop thinking about it until I put it on :)
I hope this helps you!
summary: Not worth $100, but not the worst dress ever

reviewText: SO happy with this dress!! I fell in love with it when I saw it online; I went to countless dress shops and just couldn't get this dress out of my mind! Ordering a dress from a website like Amazon is pretty sketchy, but I went against my better judgement and ordered it anyway, because the one in particular I wanted was returnable. I'm so glad I did!! I'm usually a size 0, but it only came in a size 2, so I was expecting the dress to be too big. However, it fit perfectly! I agree with others, I would order a size up. I got the black one without beading, and it's stunning. I'm sure the beading would be beautiful, but it isn't needed. The stitch work on this dress is so beautiful, and the material (and dress as a whole) is great quality! The see through part at the top isn't incredibly revealing, which I liked. You can barely tell. Bottom line, LOVE this dress, and the price is unbeatable. The pictures I took don't do it justice. Can't wait to wear it to my winter formal!

Wasn't super impressed with this suit. For the price, its a good value.  However....the fabric is rather flimsy, I cannot see it holding together well over repeated uses. The bottoms were ok, but the fabric is so thin, I see these having a hard time staying up, especially if you are in the water or saying, walking around, etc.  The top was better made, it wasn't as thin as the bottom. To me, the biggest drawback on this suit was the fringe.  The way it hangs, it basically draws the entire focal point of the suit straight to your belly. And if you are like me, and don't have the super flattest belly in the whole world....then it just accentuates any problem areas you might have around your middle. For me, it was rather comical, almost like a big fringe-y arrow pointing right at my troublesome belly.  I have never had this problem with a suit before. Maybe cutting the fringe would help with that, but then the top would just look odd.

So its going back.  I wanted fun and sexy for my Vegas trip, and this did not deliver.

Also, another reason for the 3-stars... this suit did NOT come with a sanitary liner in the bottoms.  I thought that was standard on all swimsuits that are being sold to the public.  Like, you know, for sanitary reasons.
summary: Flimsy thin suit.  Not great but not horrible for the money.

I took photos, and actually it looks much better in these pics than it does in real life.

The quality of this wig is fantastic! For the price you pay, you get your money's worth and then some. It is a little on the thinner side, but it's not really obvious unless you grip the hair in your hand. I am using this wig as a base wig for a Megara cosplay so I'm very excited to style it and wear it! Fantastic buy, I would recommend it in a heartbeat.
