reviewText: Letters make it hard to miss the fact that you're wearing compression socks.
Fits perfectly and keeps my training shoes from rubbing me raw while I break them in.

I bought two pair of these. I have plantar fasciitis. The lack of size chart is simply dumb. I went to their web site and determined I was a size 3 (lll). They arrived too big but washing shrunk them a bit. Also dumb. Conclusion: these socks did nothing to help my feet. They are also thinner than I like and have an annoying toe seam. I am going back to my original choice. Feetures are the best running/golfing socks Ive ever worn. They are not compression socks but they fit better and have a great arch support. Much better than these in many ways and are the same or less in price. My opinion is that compression socks are only benificial in a knee lengenth. No-show socks cant reasonably be expected to compress anything. Bottom line, don't bother with these.
Love them will be buying them again highly recommended

These socks are nice. I have the need for comfortable, light compression socks and these are excellent.  I have situational edema in the summer plus I'm a year post-op from ankle repair surgery.  If you are looking for a firm-tight compression sock this isn't it. I've had those types of sock post surgery and they are simply too uncomfortable for all day wear beyond a post-op surgical need.  If you are looking for a sock with light compression that you can actually tolerate to wear all day - this is it.  The sock itself is soft, slightly padded & comfortable. The  padding on the back of the foot / heel is a stroke of genius. This padding keeps your shoe from rubbing - sweet!  I bought 2 pair and I will purchase another pair or 2.
summary: NICE - Light Compression Socks you can easily wear all day

reviewText: My wife purchased these to be used on her runs. One star rating for a three star product.

Let me explain my background: I serve at a restaurant, which requires a full black uniform with any tie you'd desire. I've worn a variety of ties in my four years, but I've learned to buy what I don't mind getting dirty as each daily spattering of food graces its material. When I came across this item, what caught my eye was the price and the description.

This product isn't as refined as in the picture, nor doesn't emulate class. Additionally, the design becomes more disheveled and haphazard the farther up the tie. On the other hand, it is slimming, as it's a skinny tie.

I tie an eldridge knot, which places emphasis on the small end of the tie as it's used to design the knot. However, the back end is simply patchwork of the pictured pattern. It's used to fill space and was never meant to be seen with anything but a regular knot. It's lazy.

Add this to their false advertising, "Stain resistant" in the description and "ONE WEEK SALE!!" in the title, overseas marketing certainly knows how to get a mediocre product off their shelves.
Super cute, comfortable, and affordable. Hard to beat that.

The tie itself looks lovely and slimming! Tied in my favorite eldridge knot, it's stunning and I got many compliments from my other servers.

The down side and subtraction of TWO stars is the false advertising. One star for not being stain resistant (It's not horrible, but not the server's tie I thought I'd found), and one for the blasphemous name of the product that exclaims "ONE WEEK SALE!!"  Over a month later, it's just a clickbait title to get me to buy the product and it worked.

GREAT product! Not a fan of the marketing team.

reviewText:
Okay, so I was a little scared about this product after reading the reviews but I went for it anyway.  What I found lacking in the reviews were comments on material thickness (which is why I got black), length and styling. Here we go:

Material: The skirt half is thick enough that you can't see your panty line and as far as the black goes its not see through.
Length: I am 5'6 and if I put the skirt at mid waist it stops at my heel. If I put it at my top rib its stops at the middle of my ankles.
Styling: Even though most of the reviews say that the straps are too big, that is not the case for me. I have a 28' waist and it will only wrap around me twice maybe (depending on the style). They are really thick though but I like the coverage.

reviewText: These are my favorite pants of all time; and, I wish they would make them again. I would buy several pairs in whatever colors they come in.  The stone is beautiful! Remarkable!  I would give them 5 stars if it were not for the fact that the material does lose its initial luster after washing on warm or hot water; and, although, they do seem to stain easily, I found over time that taking some liquid detergent and rubbing the stains seems to work well in removing them. Since I am short, I love the fact that these are around 27" in length for the Petite and the Regulars also aren't too long for me.  I hope National brings these back someday.

This is a terrific boonie. It runs on the larger brim side, with an attractive flop that looks really great on me personally, and I think would flatter a guy or a girl. It fits as specified, from about 7 1/8 to 7 3/4. It is BEAUTIFULLY MADE in washable twill with secure fly or bullet holders on the brim. It is VERY attractive with a light blue denim-ish color atop, and a darker contrasting underside to the brim, which also suits me very well. I LOVE THIS HAT!! I wanted to replace my beloved Route 66 boonie rain hat (also good for sun protection) that I purchased many years ago in  army green,  ,  with a smaller brim, from a classic Route 66 restaurant in Santa Rosa, NM, many years ago. My classic boonie  was stolen and sadly, had great sentimental value while also being my favorite and ONLY rain hat.
 This is a beautiful and practical new boonie to break in with some new history.
summary: AWESOME BOONIE, VERY WELL MADE IN WASHABLE TWILL

reviewText:
I'm a smaller guy, so I'm used to wearing clothing that's a bit larger. Unfortunately, mine are just slightly too big. The pouch and the straps need to be taken in at least an inch to make a nice snug normal fit. If I could have bought a smaller size, I would. Overall craftsmanship is good, with noticeable threads loose in some spots; though, there's nothing serious. Material is comfy and soft, straps are really cosy on your legs, and the waistband was a near perfect fit. Despite many guys probably hating on the pink one included, I like it. Who cares what colour it is when it's in your pants? ;)

They also look quite sexy on their own. If your partner likes your pants riding low, this will be a comfy way to tease him/her. For the price, I'd buy it again. Definitely worth the money for some nice jockstraps to wear every day.
summary: Too big for me, but they're hot ;)

reviewText: Bought these for everyday school wear for my very active son. All his previous shoes (Nike, New Balance, Adidas...) would wear out with holes in the toe or sole within 3-6 weeks. He has been wearing these now for six months (!!) and only now is the sole starting to wear out and come off the shoe - and that is with daily hard playing of sports. Paying the extra $$ was well worth it to have such long-lasting high quality shoes. N

Cute, stylish, quality shoulder bag, just as pictured. Pliable, attractive leather, larger than a long wallet. Its strap, when adjusted, allows the bag to swing at hip or waist. Small enough to be light of weight -- hurray! -- compared to most shoulder bags I've owned. Be aware that the zippered opening at the top of the bag may not be long enough for some wallets to fit.
Update: Have used this bag constantly since May of this year. Still looks great. Because it barely fits my thick, passport-sized wallet and iphone -- as was planned, as a small compact bag was wanted -- closing is often a hard zip, so hard, I'd have thought the zipper would have been broken or become frayed at this point. But not so. In fact, zipper, all stitching, chromed latch and strap hardware, leather, and liner are still in perfect condition despite hard use. It's been on my shoulder or lumped into my computer bag constantly during my usual work week of national travel for business.
P.S. The two-toned beige and tan do go with everything white, light, tawny, or in neutral shades.
summary: Cute, stylish, quality shoulder bag, just as ...

I received this product new,on time,in good packaging and at a discount for a honest review. Below is a complete description. SHOW YOUR SPIRIT: Get fired up and cheer your favorite team on to victory with these orange and white fingerless gloves. Whether it's for varsity, high school, college, fantasy or professional, these leg warmers are perfect for any sporting event. Great for football, basketball, baseball, hockey, tennis, softball, rugby, wrestling, lacrosse, marching band, dance, swim and more! Show your pride as a freshman, sophomore, junior or senior at a school or university, or as an avid fan!
WHO WEARS ORANGE & WHITE: Wear these adorable fingerless gloves as you cheer for college teams like the Tennessee Volunteers and the Texas Longhorns. If your college or pro team isn't listed here, let us know and we'll be sure to add it! If your high school sports these colors, wear them proud.
GOES GREAT WITH: Score major fashion points when you wear these fingerless gloves and be a cheerleader for your team. Great addition to a winter outfit when you're watching Bowl Games in the snowy season, but light enough you can wear them in the breezy fall when you're tailgating, being a soccer mom or watching little league. So fun, you can dress them with your coat or sweater, or wear them with a spirited costume of shorts and a t-shirt of your mascot! Also great for March Madness!
GREAT QUALITY AND FIT: These fingerless gloves kick their competition with their super soft 100% acrylic and fashionable striped design. Machine wash in cold and hang to dry. These fingerless gloves measure 6.25" by 4" with generous stretch. One size fits most. Be your own referee and call the style play any way you want. Great look for NBA, WNBA, AFL and NFL games and playoffs, student sorority events, and high school football season too!
WHEN TO WEAR: No matter if you're a yelling sports fanatic or just interested in the watch party food at halftime, these festive fingerless gloves will show your pride. Keep up your team's honorary color tradition and wear this scarf on game day at the court, field or stadium, at homecoming, a school parade, pre-gaming, celebrating after a victory, or just visiting your campus with your alumni group. Great for a Lady Longhorns game against the Oklahoma Sooners or watching the Lady Volunteers!
Fun to wear

I want to love this hoodie. While I can't commit to full on love at this point, I can say I do indeed like it very much. Here's why I'm not in love. As others have mentioned the pockets in the front are on the small side. I find the interior of the pocket to be reasonable and it fits my Samsung S5 phone. However, I can't put my hands in my pockets if they get cold because the opening is small and the zipper scratches my hands. While I don't have tiny cabbage hands, I also do not have giant man hands. I would say I am average handed. I can get my hand in minus the thumb but if I squeeze in Mr. Thumbkin I really have to work to get my hands out and it becomes painful. I enjoy the hood and the snaps to keep my neck warm. The length is just right to cover my rather ample bottom. The sleeves have some kind of poly fabric lining while the body has faux shearling. This is pretty ingenious because it means your layers don't bunch when your putting this hoodie on. The sleeve lining is slippery and allows those pesky primary and secondary layers to remain unaffected by your need for yet a third layer. This is perfect for fall and moving into winter. Follow their size chart. I normally wear a large/xl and I ordered this in xxxl. I have room for layers but I wouldn't say this is an over sized fit having sized up so much.
summary: I want to love this hoodie.

reviewText: If you pay attention to their garment dimensions fit won't be a problem. The material is light and breezy and overall, the shirt looks as pictured.  Once washed and pressed, it is a cute shirt for a day of gardening or at the beach. However, the quality/accuracy of construction is poor as if there are novice seamstresses putting these together. Stress-points like top corners of pocket are not reinforced - inside collar and inside placket joins are serged, not topstitched, so if your collar turns out you won't see a clean finish - thread quality is cheap - the buttonholes down the front of my shirt were made in pale blue thread, not grey to match shirt fabric, and were not centered on the placket - buttons are white plastic.  If you want a nice, almost disposable shirt for very casual wear, this is your baby, just make sure to look around at all the ads for this shirt so you don't pay too much.
summary: Cute, But Don't Look Too Close

reviewText: Fits great!

I am 5'1" and usually wear a large. I ordered an XL and they mostly fit as expected (the length was good for a short person like me). Unfortunately, they are incredibly uncomfortable. I'm 7 months pregnant and not really that huge, but the waistband hits right at my belly button and the elastic is too snug there to be comfortable. Plus, they did not stay up well at all, and pulling up on leggings all day is not a very attractive pose. Also, the seam for the top part of the pants that goes over the belly starts well below the hips all the way around and felt really strange since it's such a weird place for a seam.
summary: Waistband right in the middle of stomach, very uncomfortable
